Package x10.mongo.yak

Class Summary
YakCursor Yak implementation of cursors.
YakList A small variation on an ArrayList.
YakMap A Mongo-specific BSON object, presenting a good X10 interface.
YakUtil A class of utilities for working with BSON and Mongo objects in X10.
YakMapReduceOutput
YakCollection The Yak representation of a Mongo collection.
LoadedYakMap An auxiliary type, designed to have the y-<"a">-n idiom work.
